title: 'Smooth and less fizzy hair'
body: 'Biotique Ocean Kelp Shampoo is a popular hair care product that formulated to address the issue of hair fall. This shampoo is enriched with natural ingredients that help to strengthen hair follicles
column6: and reduce hair fall.  The key ingredient in this shampoo is Ocean Kelp
column7: which is known for its high mineral content. It helps to nourish the scalp and hair follicles
column8: promoting healthy hair growth. Other natural ingredients like Bhringraj
column10: and Neem also help to strengthen hair and reduce hair fall.  This shampoo is suitable for all hair types and can be used by both men and women. It is free from harmful chemicals like SLS
column13: making it a safe and gentle option for those with sensitive skin.  smells so good
column14: Useing this shampoo for past few days and have seen significant reduction in hair fall and an improvement in hair texture and volume. I hope using this shampoo can also help to prevent dandruff and other scalp conditions.  Overall
column15: it is a highly effective and affordable hair care product that can help to address the issue of hair fall and promote healthy hair growth.'

title: 'very useful for the hair'
body: The Biotique Bio Ocean Kelp Anti Hair Fall Shampoo is a true hair growth therapy in a bottle! I've been using it for a while now, and I'm thrilled with the results.  First and foremost, the shampoo's natural ingredients, especially the ocean kelp, make it stand out from other products in the market. It feels great to know that I'm using a chemical-free and eco-friendly product on my hair.  The anti-hair fall formula has worked wonders for me. After using this shampoo for a few weeks, I noticed a significant reduction in hair fall. It not only prevents hair breakage but also promotes new hair growth, which is fantastic!  The 650ml bottle provides excellent value for money. A little goes a long way, and the shampoo lathers up well, cleansing my scalp thoroughly without over-drying.  I must mention the pleasant herbal fragrance of the shampoo. It leaves my hair smelling fresh and rejuvenated after each wash.  The Biotique Bio Ocean Kelp Anti Hair Fall Shampoo has improved the overall texture and health of my hair. My locks feel softer, smoother, and more manageable.  The packaging is sturdy and leak-proof, ensuring the product arrives in perfect condition. Additionally, the delivery from Amazon was quick and hassle-free.
